mapper.select: SELECT CAST(`p`.POSITION_ID as char) as POSITION_ID, `p`.NAME, `p`.PROCESS_CODE, CASE WHEN pos.SECTION_ID = 1 THEN CAST(`p`.LIGHT_DIVISION_FLG as char) ELSE '0' end as LIGHT_DIVISION_FLG, cast(coalesce(`pf`.material_count, 0) as char) as material_count, cast(coalesce(`pf2`.material_count, 0) as char) as light_fix_count, qf.quotation_first FROM `position` p JOIN (Select 0 as quotation_first from dual union Select 1 as quotation_first from dual) qf LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(p.material_id) as material_count, p.position_id, m.quotation_first FROM production_feature p join material m ON m.material_id = p.material_id WHERE p.finish_time IS NULL AND p.operate_result not in (5, 7) AND p.SECTION_ID = #{section_id} and m.level in (9 , 91, 92, 93, 96, 97, 98, 99) GROUP BY p.position_id, m.quotation_first) pf2 ON `p`.position_id = pf2.position_id AND qf.quotation_first = pf2.quotation_first LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(p.material_id) as material_count, p.position_id, m.quotation_first FROM production_feature p join material m ON m.material_id = p.material_id WHERE p.finish_time IS NULL AND p.operate_result not in (5, 7) AND p.SECTION_ID = #{section_id} and (m.level not in (9 , 91, 92, 93, 96, 97, 98, 99) or (p.position_id = 64 and m.level is null)) AND (p.position_id != 77 or (action_time is not null and finish_time is null)) GROUP BY p.position_id, m.quotation_first) pf ON `p`.position_id = pf.position_id AND qf.quotation_first = pf.quotation_first JOIN position_of_section pos ON p.position_id = pos.position_id AND pos.SECTION_ID = #{section_id} WHERE LINE_ID = #{line_id} AND DELETE_FLG = 0 ORDER BY `p`.PROCESS_CODE, quotation_first;

SELECT `m`.agreed_date, (`m`.scheduled_expedited * 10 + `mp`.line_expedited) as expedited, m.omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, `m`.direct_flg, `m`.ocm, min(`matp`.order_date) as partical_order_date, CASE WHEN max(`matp`.bo_flg in (8, 9)) = 1 THEN 9 WHEN max(`matp`.bo_flg = 1) = 1 THEN 1 WHEN max(`matp`.bo_flg = 2) = 1 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END as partical_bo, max(`matp`.arrival_plan_date) as arrival_plan_date, CASE WHEN `ppf1`.light_division_flg = 0 THEN -1 ELSE `m`.quotation_first END as px, '' as symbol, `m`.material_id, `m`.`level`, `m`.serial_no, `c`.name as category_name, `mdl`.name as model_name, `mp`.scheduled_date , `ppf1`.operate_result, `ppf1`.process_code, `ppf1`.position_id ,(select name from position where position_id =(select position_id from production_feature where material_id = m.material_id and position_id not in (select position_id from position where line_id = #{line_id}) and operate_result not in (5, 8) order by (1-ISNULL(action_time)), action_time desc, operate_result desc limit 1)) as otherline_position_name, (`mp`.`rework_trigger_position_id` IS NOT NULL) as is_reworking, (`mp`.`scheduled_assign_date` = current_date) as is_today, infsa.in_pa, `ppf1`.position_name FROM material m JOIN material_process mp ON `m`.material_id = `mp`.material_id AND `mp`.line_id = #{line_id} LEFT JOIN material_partial matp ON `m`.material_id = matp.material_id JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN category c ON `mdl`.category_id = `c`.category_id JOIN (SELECT `pfp`.material_id, `pfp`.position_id, `pfp`.process_code, `pfp`.operate_result, `pfp`.light_division_flg,pfp.position_name, `pfp`.inline_time FROM ( SELECT `pf`.material_id, `pf`.position_id, `p`.process_code, `pf`.operate_result, p.light_division_flg,p.name AS position_name, pma.inline_time FROM production_feature pf JOIN `position` p ON `pf`.position_id = `p`.position_id AND `p`.line_id = #{line_id} JOIN material pma ON pf.material_id = pma.material_id WHERE pma.outline_time IS NULL AND pma.break_back_flg = 0 AND operate_result not in (5 , 8) AND `pf`.section_id = #{section_id} ORDER BY (1-ISNULL(`pf`.action_time)) , `pf`.action_time DESC, (`pf`.operate_result = 3) DESC, `pf`.operate_result DESC ) pfp GROUP BY `pfp`.material_id having not (`pfp`.operate_result = 3 and process_code = 302 and inline_time is not null) ) ppf1 ON `m`.material_id = `ppf1`.material_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT fsa.`material_id`, count(1) as in_pa FROM `for_solution_area` fsa WHERE fsa.`solved_time` IS NULL AND NOT (reason = 2 AND f_diffworktime(`happen_time`, current_timestamp) < 0.06) GROUP BY material_id) infsa ON infsa.material_id = m.material_id
LEFT
JOIN inline_plan ip ON `m`.material_id = `ip`.material_id WHERE `m`.section_id = #{section_id} AND `m`.outline_time IS NULL -- [AND `m`.fix_type = 1] AND (`mp`.`finish_date` IS NULL OR (`mp`.`rework_trigger_position_id` IS NOT NULL AND `ppf1`.operate_result != 2))
AND (ppf1.position_id = #{position_id} OR EXISTS (SELECT operate_result, process_code, position_id FROM production_feature WHERE material_id = `m`.material_id AND position_id = #{position_id} AND finish_time IS NULL))
AND mp.`scheduled_assign_date` = curdate()
GROUP BY `m`.material_id ORDER BY expedited desc, agreed_date, `ip`.seq, `ppf1`.PROCESS_CODE;
mapper.update: update material_process set line_expedited = not line_expedited where material_id = #{material_id} and line_id = #{line_id}
update material set scheduled_expedited = not scheduled_expedited where material_id = #{material_id}
